code: export const buttonSizes=size=>{switch(size){case"xs":return"px-4 text-xs min-w-[4rem]";case"sm":return"px-4 text-sm min-w-[4rem]";case"md":return"px-4 text-sm min-w-[6rem]";case"lg":return"px-6 py-3 text-lg min-w-[6rem]";case"xl":return"px-6 py-3 text-xl min-w-[8rem]";default:{const _exhaustiveSwitch=size;return"";}}};
